page.title: 12Transport.
page.content: We entered a{Road Safety Competition} run by the RAC, and as part of our work we made a{model}of our area. First we went for a walk to note down all the buildings, then built up the model on an old blackboard. We also had to make an{electrically powered {vehicle}which we called 'Seaton Delaval Municipal Maintenance Vehicle'. On our model we marked all the places in our town where there were{dangerous crossings.}We marked on yellow lines, Zebra crossings and placed all the road signs in the proper places. We received a certificate for our model and it was talked about on a local TV programme. We also found out that through our town in one day, there are 208{public {service journeys}and 68 947 in a year! There are 11 separate bus routes through our area.
